The Puzzle

"ABCD * D = DCBA", Replace every character with a number to make the equation mathematically right.

The Solution using brute-force algorithm

{% highlight c++ linenos%}

include<bits/stdc++.h>

using namespace std; int main(){ for(int a=0;a<=9;a++){ for(int b=0;b<=9;b++)if(a!=b){ for(int c=0;c<=9;c++)if(a!=c && b!=c){ for(int d=0;d<=9;d++)if(a!=d && b!=d && c!=d){ if((a1000+b100+c10+d)d == (d1000+c100+b*10+a)) return cout<<"abcd\n"<<a<<b<<c<<d,0; } } } }

return 0;

} {% endhighlight %}

The final answer is 1089.
